short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome extension that turns any webpage into a party!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension overlays any webpage with confetti and flashing lights! Pair it with music of your choice and every page will become a party!
